title: Keepers of the mystery
brief_description: A Poetic travellogue of Scotland, documenting the distillation process of whisky on an industrial level, including barrel construction, blending, tasting (malt whisky and grain whiskey), Packaging and distribution. The film ends with a charming animated commercial for Whitehorse Cellar Scotch Whisky.
